name: Road Hero Speed Car Racing Cops
name_original: Road Hero Speed Car Racing Cops
description:
Road Hero Speed Car Racing Cops is an arcade racing game. 

Drive your police car through superbly stunning roads, collect coins, avoid traffic cars and arrest the thugs.

KEY FEATURES OF ROAD HERO SPEED CAR RACING COPS ARE-

- Easy intuitive gameplay!
- Interesting Story!
- Lots of Coins to collect!
- Avoid Collisions with traffic!
- Arrest fast and furious Thugs!
- Race through exciting tracks!
- Experience thrilling audio and visual effects!

Instructions to play: 

Left and Right to steer the vehicle.

P to Pause, Q to Un-Pause the game.
